text: Hospital Pharmacy of North Norway Trust (, ) is a health trust owned by Northern Norway Regional Health Authority that operates six hospital pharmacies. The pharmacies are part of the Ditt Apotek chain and use Norsk Medisinaldepot as wholesaler. The pharmacies are located at Tromsø University Hospital, Bodø Hospital, Harstad Hospital, Narvik Hospital, Lofoten Hospital and Stokmarknes Hospital. title: Northern Norway Pharmaceutical Trust
